code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from"react";import Card from"../components/Card";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function Papers(){const[papers,setPapers]=useState([]);const[query,setQuery]=useState("");useEffect(()=>{fetch("/seqamlab/data/papers.json").then(res=>res.json()).then(setPapers);},[]);const filtered=papers.filter(p=>p.title.toLowerCase().includes(query.toLowerCase())||(p.authors||"").toLowerCase().includes(query.toLowerCase())||(p.year||"").includes(query));return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"max-w-5xl mx-auto px-4 py-8",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-2xl font-bold text-[#cc0033] mb-4",children:"Research Papers"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Filter by title, author, or year...",value:query,onChange:e=>setQuery(e.target.value),className:"border px-3 py-2 rounded w-full mb-6"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"grid grid-cols-1 sm:grid-cols-2 md:grid-cols-3 gap-4",children:filtered.slice(0).reverse().map((p,i)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Card,{title:p.title,footer:p.doi&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:"https://doi.org/".concat(p.doi),target:"_blank",rel:"noreferrer",children:"DOI"}),children:[p.authors," (",p.year,")",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),p.journal&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{children:p.journal})]},i))})]});}
